NAME: Seth Lundy
COMMENT: Dec 17: Lundy (ankle), who aggravated an ankle injury during the preseason, is slated to be re-evaluated sometime in January, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

NAME: Cody Zeller
COMMENT: Dec 10: Zeller (personal) won't play in Wednesday's game versus the Knicks, Kevin Chouinard of the Hawks' official site reports.
